summary: Execute a signed, multi-steward reconciliation pilot

steps.title: Collect steward node snapshots and keys
steps.notes: Coordinate with active stewards to export repo/capsule snapshots, register their Ed25519 public keys under governance/keys/, and capture plan metadata referencing systemic targets.

steps.title: Capture signed systemic receipts per node
steps.notes: Ensure each steward emits signed systemic receipts (systemic metadata + signature) using the shared schema before reconciliation.

steps.title: Run receipt_sync with signature enforcement
steps.notes: Invoke tools.network.receipt_sync with --verify-signatures/--require-signatures against live snapshots; store outputs under _report/network/<timestamp>/.

steps.title: Publish results and resolve conflicts
steps.notes: Attach ledger/conflicts/summary artifacts to this plan, log findings in manager-report, and escalate conflicts (S4/S6) via follow-up plans if any mismatches emerge.

checkpoint.description: Signed, multi-steward reconciliation completes with actionable outputs

priority.reason: Validates decentralized operation across live stewards with signed evidence.
